structure.unit: SCHOOL EMPLOYEES -- TEACHERS' RETIREMENT AND TENURE

law.catch_line: Reports to be made by teachers.

text.section: Each teacher or other person in the public schools shall make reports and inventories to the district superintendent at the time and in the manner prescribed by the district board of education and the Kentucky Board of Education.
No teacher shall willfully make a false monthly or term report of time taught or other item or shall willfully fail to make a required report.

law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 362, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1996. -- Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 484, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 8, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978; and ch. 155, sec. 82, effective June 17, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4503-6, 4503-7.
